title: Integrated Literacy and Prompt Engineering Workshop for Pre-Service Teachers

context.prior_knowledge: Core mathematical curriculum knowledge and digital tool proficiency
context.additional_context: Part of an in-house pre-service teacher training program, focusing on developing competencies to effectively integrate generative AI tools into mathematics instruction.

learning_goals: The BROKE framework (Background, Role, Objective, Key Results, Evolution) can be applied to design and evaluate AI prompts related to mathematics curriculum
The ability to design AI-integrated lessons is diagnosed across four dimensions of disciplinary literacy (Knowledge, Application, Evaluation, Ethics)
Through conversational analysis with generative AI, preservice teachers' prompt engineering proficiency is classified into three levels (Low/Medium/High) and improvement strategies are developed
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
